title: Certayne sermons of the ryghte famous and excellente clerk master Barnardine Ochine, borne within the famous vniuersitie of Siena in Italy, now also an exyle in this lyfe, for the faithful testimony of Iesus Christe. Faythfully translated into Englyshe
author: Ochino, Bernardino, 1487-1564.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Jhon Day: dwelling ouer Aldersgate beneth S. Martins. These bookes are to bee solde at hys shop in Chepesyde, by the Litle Counduit at the sygne of the Resurrection. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. Per septenium,
